en: On Open: Reveal a random other box.
On Open: Reveal all boxes in this row.
On Open: Become Poisoned. After you open 8 boxes, lose.
On Open: If you're Poisoned, remove your Poison. If this is adjacent to an open Viral Box, win.
After you open a box, explodes, destroying itself and adjacent boxes.
On Click: Spend 1 Gold to reveal a random adjacent box.
On Open: The next time you click an unrevealed box, reveal it instead of opening it.
On Open: If you've opened every adjacent box, win.
On Open: Close a random other opened box.
On Open: If this was the first box you opened this game, lose.
On Open: Transform a random adjacent closed box into a Flaming Box.
On Click: Spend 6 Gold to win.
On Open: Reveal the corner boxes.
On Open: If the Sword is open, win. Otherwise, lose.
On Open: If 11 or more boxes are open, win.
On Open: Close all adjacent boxes.
On Open: Transform 2 random boxes into Loser Boxes.
On Open: Lose all your Gold.
On Click: Destroy a random box, then reveal a random box. Usable 5 times.
Whenever you open another box, 1/3 chance to gain 1 Gold.
On Open: After you open 12 boxes, win.
Whenever you open another box, 1/3 chance to close this.
If revealed, is revealed as a random other box. On Open: 1/3 chance to lose.
On Open: The next time you would win, you don't.
On Click: Spend 1 Gold to close a random open box.
On Open: For 3 opens, you can't lose.
On Open: Transform 2 random boxes into Mimic Boxes.
On Open: If this was the first box you opened this game, win.
On Open: Destroy the next box you click instead of opening or using it.
Whenever you open another box, 1/10 chance to lose.
After you open a box, explodes, destroying all boxes in its row.
On Open: Close the next open non-Tape box you click.
Whenever you open another box, opens a random adjacent box.
On Open: If all boxes in this row are opened, win.
Whenever you open another box, reveal a random adjacent box.
After you open 3 boxes, destroy this and all but the outer rim of boxes.
On Open: If the Wand and Hat Boxes are open, win.
On Open: If 11 or more boxes are destroyed, win.
On Open: Transform a random unrevealed box into a Fairy Box. If 4 Fairy Boxes are open, win.
On Open: If the Cloak and Wand Boxes are open, win.
On Open: Invert winning and losing for the rest of the game.
After you open a box, destroys itself.
On Open: If the Hat and Cloak Boxes are open, win.
On Open: Open the boxes right and left of this.
On Open: If 21 boxes are open, win. If more than 21 are open, lose.
If this box is destroyed while open, win.
On Click: If 10 or more boxes are open Fire Boxes, win.
On Open: If the next box you open is a Lock Box, win.
Maybe a key could open this..?
On Open: Transform a random other box into a Fire Box.
On Open: Transform all other revealed boxes into Loser Boxes.
On Open: Revive 5 random destroyed boxes. (Boxes are revived closed.)
On Open: Reveal all adjacent boxes. After you open a box, explodes, destroying itself and adjacent boxes.
On Open: For the next 4 opens, you can only open boxes adjacent to open boxes.
If this box is destroyed while open, lose.
On Open: If the Dragon is revealed, lose. Otherwise, gain 3 Gold.
Whenever you open an adjacent box, gain 1 Gold.
After you open 3 boxes, becomes a closed copy of a random box.
On Open: If you won the last run, win.
On Click: Spend 1 Gold to reveal a random box.
After you open a box, transform adjacent open boxes into Viral Boxes.
On Open: Transform 5 random unrevealed boxes into Food Boxes. After you open 6 boxes without opening a Food Box, lose.
On Open: If you don't have a Badge equipped, transform the Empty Box into a Winner Box.
After you open a box, destroy the top box (right to left).
On Open: If this is the third time you've opened this box, win.
On Open: Reveal 10 random boxes. After you open 3 boxes, lose.
On Open: If in the bottom row, win. Otherwise, transform a random box in the row below into a Waterfall Box.
On Open: If adjacent to an open Bedrock Box, win.
On Open: Paint the background a random color.
On Open: You can't open adjacent boxes for 3 opens.
On Open: If no adjacent boxes are revealed, reveal all adjacent boxes.
On Open: If 18 or more boxes are revealed, win.
On Open: Transform 3 random unrevealed boxes into Fish Boxes.
Whenever you reveal a box in this row, open it.
On Open: The next 2 times you click a revealed box, transform it into a random other box instead of opening or using it.
If you can't open any boxes, you win.
On Open: If 3 or more Fish Boxes are open, win.
On Open: Transform all adjacent boxes into the same random box.
On Click: 20% chance to win. 30% chance to lose.
When you would lose, if this box is open, destroy it instead.
On Open: Paint unrevealed boxes rainbow.
On Click: Close 5 other random boxes. Then destroy this.
If this box is transformed while open, win.
On Open: Reveal the X Box.
On Open: If there's a contiguous line of open boxes to the Treasure Map Box, win.
Whenever you open an unrevealed box, reveal a random box.
When you open a box, stars fly out!
Whenever you destroy a box, it flies away!
On Open: Lose. Then, if you didn't lose, win.
You can only open the highest possible boxes.
On Open: Destroy the Winner and Loser boxes.
On Open: After you open 9 unrevealed boxes, win.
On Open: Transform the boxes above this into Ivy Boxes.
Start Of Run: Reveal a random box.
